entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
